files.blurred_objects.ini:
; Wheel blurring at speed is simulated by swapping 3D rims at different speeds. This file controls which object will have blur and at what speeds 

; WHEEL INDEXES
; 0=	LEFT FRONT
; 1=	RIGHT FRONT
; 2=	LEFT REAR
; 3=	RIGHT REAR

files.colliders.ini:
; colliders are used for optimizing performance of collisions of the bottom of the car with the asphalt and kerbs
; it is advisable to use just one that goes the front tyres to the rear tyres
; you could use more than one but we greatly advice to never use more than 2-3 in order to keep CPU occupancy low. 
; Keep in mind that the 3D collider also does collisions properly so use the colliders.ini just for car bottom collisions

[COLLIDER_0]
CENTRE=0 ,0.0 ,-0.12 	; where the center of the collision box will be placed. 0,0,0 XYZ reference is the CoG
SIZE=1.25 ,0.1 ,2.75		; the size of the collision box in XYZ meters

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.engine_v6.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=1
POWER_CURVE=power.lut			; power curve file
COAST_CURVE=FROM_COAST_REF 		; coast curve. can define 3 different options (coast reference, coast values for mathematical curve, coast curve file)

[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.15					; engine inertia
LIMITER=8100					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=19					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=1.0		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[COAST_REF]
RPM=8300						; rev number reference
TORQUE=100						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.992					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=2.1				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=1.553				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=1.6		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3500				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.0					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure

[HEADER]
VERSION=1

[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.15					; engine inertia
LIMITER=8100					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=19					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=1.0		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[COAST_REF]
RPM=8000						; rev number reference
TORQUE=100						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.992					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.25				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=1.1725				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=1.2		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3500				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.0					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure

[HEADER]
SIZE_MULT=44                ; size's multipler of the total flame animation

; starting animation
[PRESET_START_0]
TRIGGER=2                  ; animation's frame trigger index
OFFSET=0.0,0.0,0.01        ; position of texture
SIZE=0.08                 ; size of the texture
TYPE=1                     ; 0 = F type texture (f2.dds), 1 = X type (x0.dds), 2 = L type (l3.dds) 
RGB=113,130,254,0.38         ; color and intesity of the texture

[PRESET_START_1]
TRIGGER=1
OFFSET=0.0,0.0,-0.02
SIZE=0.0
TYPE=1
RGB=0,0,0,0

[PRESET_START_2]
TRIGGER=2
OFFSET=0.0,0.0,-0.0125
SIZE=0.0
TYPE=1
RGB=0,0,00,0

; ending animation : TRIGGER is inverse cause textures start already visible
[PRESET_END_0]
TRIGGER=5
OFFSET=0.0,0.0,0.09
SIZE=0.08
TYPE=1
RGB=255,162,94,0.36

[PRESET_END_1]
TRIGGER=4
OFFSET=0.0,0.0,0.06
SIZE=0.0
TYPE=1
RGB=255,190,0,0.30

[PRESET_END_2]

OFFSET=0.0,0.0,0.03
SIZE=0.08
TYPE=1
RGB=00,10,100,0.32

[PRESET_LOOP_0]

SIZE=0.06

OFFSET=0.0,0.0,0.07
SIZE=0.09
TYPE=1

[PRESET_LOOP_2]

OFFSET=0.0,0.0,0.02
SIZE=0.05
TYPE=1

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0

[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336		
GEAR_2=1.917		
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085	
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=1200				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

[HEADER]
VERSION=1
POWER_CURVE=power.lut			; power curve file
COAST_CURVE=FROM_COAST_REF 		; coast curve. can define 3 different options (coast reference, coast values for mathematical curve, coast curve file)

[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.15					; engine inertia
LIMITER=8100					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=19					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=1.0		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[COAST_REF]
RPM=8000						; rev number reference
TORQUE=100						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.992					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.25				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=1.171				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=1.2		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3500				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.0					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure

files.engine.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=1
POWER_CURVE=power.lut			; power curve file
COAST_CURVE=FROM_COAST_REF 		; coast curve. can define 3 different options (coast reference, coast values for mathematical curve, coast curve file)

[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.15					; engine inertia
LIMITER=8000					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=31					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=1.0		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[COAST_REF]
RPM=7900						; rev number reference
TORQUE=100						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.992					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.25				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=1.175				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=1.2		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3500				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.0					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds

VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts

MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]

POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]

POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.colliders.ini:
; colliders are used for optimizing performance of collisions of the bottom of the car with the asphalt and kerbs
; it is advisable to use just one that goes the front tyres to the rear tyres
; you could use more than one but we greatly advice to never use more than 2-3 in order to keep CPU occupancy low. 
; Keep in mind that the 3D collider also does collisions properly so use the colliders.ini just for car bottom collisions

[COLLIDER_0]
CENTRE=0,-0.120,0 		; where the center of the collision box will be placed. 0,0,0 XYZ reference is the CoG
SIZE=1.53,0.008,2.876		; the size of the collision box in XYZ meters
GROUND_ENABLE=1

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

STEER_ASSIST=0.000							
STEER_LOCK=450								; Real car's steer lock from center to right
STEER_RATIO=16.0
LINEAR_STEER_ROD_RATIO=0.00215			; Because of AC complex suspension geometry, you need to calculate manually the steer rod ratio
; Enter AC in dev app mode enabled
; Open SUSPENSIONS app
; turn your steering wheel by 90 degrees
; check the actual steer ratio value
; modify LINEAR_STEER_ROD_RATIO value until ingame steer ratio and car.ini STEER_RATIO values are similar

[FUEL]
CONSUMPTION=0.000125
FUEL=10
MAX_FUEL=60

[FUELTANK]
POSITION=0,-0.08,-1.51

[RIDE]
PICKUP_FRONT_HEIGHT=-0.32				; Height of the front ride height pickup point in meters WRT cg
PICKUP_REAR_HEIGHT=-0.30					; Height of the rear ride height pickup point in meters WRT cg

[PIT_STOP]

TYRE_CHANGE_TIME_SEC=10            ; 
time spent to change each tyre
FUEL_LITER_TIME_SEC=0.1   ; 
time spent to put 1 lt of fuel inside the car
BODY_REPAIR_TIME_SEC=2    ; 
time spent to repair 10% of body damage
ENGINE_REPAIR_TIME_SEC=2  ; 
time spent to repair 10% of engine damage
SUSP_REPAIR_TIME_SEC=2   ; 
time spent to repair 10% of suspension damage

MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF STEER ROD DEFLECTION ALLOWED

ACTIVATES DAMAGE DEBUG IN THE LOG
files.colliders.ini:
; colliders are used for optimizing performance of collisions of the bottom of the car with the asphalt and kerbs
; it is advisable to use just one that goes the front tyres to the rear tyres
; you could use more than one but we greatly advice to never use more than 2-3 in order to keep CPU occupancy low. 
; Keep in mind that the 3D collider also does collisions properly so use the colliders.ini just for car bottom collisions

[COLLIDER_0]
CENTRE=0 ,-0.15 ,-0.0 	; where the center of the collision box will be placed. 0,0,0 XYZ reference is the CoG
SIZE=1 ,0.1 ,3		; the size of the collision box in XYZ meters
GROUND_ENABLE=1

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

GEAR_6=0.732

[GEARBOX]

CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds

VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.

INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]

DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts

MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]

POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]

POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas

files.engine.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=1
POWER_CURVE=power.lut			; power curve file
COAST_CURVE=FROM_COAST_REF 		; coast curve. can define 3 different options (coast reference, coast values for mathematical curve, coast curve file)

[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.15					; engine inertia
LIMITER=8100					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=19					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=1.0		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[COAST_REF]
RPM=8000						; rev number reference
TORQUE=100						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.992					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.27				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=1.255				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=1.3		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3500				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.0					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.colliders.ini:
; colliders are used for optimizing performance of collisions of the bottom of the car with the asphalt and kerbs
; it is advisable to use just one that goes the front tyres to the rear tyres
; you could use more than one but we greatly advice to never use more than 2-3 in order to keep CPU occupancy low. 
; Keep in mind that the 3D collider also does collisions properly so use the colliders.ini just for car bottom collisions

[COLLIDER_0]
CENTRE=0 ,-0.22 ,-0.335 	; where the center of the collision box will be placed. 0,0,0 XYZ reference is the CoG
SIZE=1.25 ,0.1 ,3.15		; the size of the collision box in XYZ meters

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached

files.engine.ini:
[HEADER]
VERSION=1
POWER_CURVE=power.lut			; power curve file
COAST_CURVE=FROM_COAST_REF 		; coast curve. can define 3 different options (coast reference, coast values for mathematical curve, coast curve file)

[ENGINE_DATA]
ALTITUDE_SENSITIVITY=0.1			; sensitivity to altitude
INERTIA=0.15					; engine inertia
LIMITER=7400					; engine rev limiter. 0 no limiter
LIMITER_HZ=19					; Frequency of engine limiter
MINIMUM=900						; Idle rpm
DEFAULT_TURBO_ADJUSTMENT=1.0		; DEFAULT turbo adjustment if one or more turbos are cockpit adjustable

[COAST_REF]
RPM=7300						; rev number reference
TORQUE=100						; engine braking torque value in Nm at rev number reference
NON_LINEARITY=0					; coast engine brake from ZERO to TORQUE value at rpm with linear (0) to fully exponential (1)

[COAST_DATA]
COAST0=0						; 
COAST1=0
COAST=0.0000015

[COAST_CURVE]
FILENAME=coast.lut				; coasting curve file

[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.994						; Interpolation lag used slowing down the turbo
LAG_UP=0.992					; Interpolation lag used to spin up the turbo
MAX_BOOST=1.28				; Maximum boost generated. This value is never exceeded and multiply the torque like T=T*(1.0 + boost), so a boost of 2 will give you 3 times the torque at a given rpm.
WASTEGATE=1.2525				; Max level of boost before the wastegate does its things. 0 = no wastegate
DISPLAY_MAX_BOOST=1.3		; Value used by display apps
REFERENCE_RPM=3500				; The reference rpm where the turbo reaches maximum boost (at max gas pedal). 
GAMMA=1.0					; Turbo pressure sensitivity on accelerator pedal
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1.00				; cockpit adjustable turbo pressure

files.drivetrain.ini:
[TRACTION]
TYPE=RWD								; Wheel drive. Possible options: FWD (Front Wheel Drive), RWD (Rear Wheel Drive)

[GEARS]
COUNT=6									; forward gears number
GEAR_R=-3.382							; rear gear ratio
; forward gears ratios. must be equal to number of gears defined on count
GEAR_1=3.336
GEAR_2=1.917
GEAR_3=1.323
GEAR_4=1.085
GEAR_5=0.874
GEAR_6=0.732
FINAL=4.10					             ; final gear ratio

[DIFFERENTIAL]
POWER=0.8							    ; differential lock under power. 1.0=100% lock - 0 0% lock
COAST=0.8								; differential lock under coasting. 1.0=100% lock 0=0% lock
PRELOAD=35								; preload torque setting

[GEARBOX]
CHANGE_UP_TIME=200						; change up time in milliseconds
CHANGE_DN_TIME=280						; change down time in milliseconds
AUTO_CUTOFF_TIME=0					; Auto cutoff time for upshifts in milliseconds, 0 to disable
SUPPORTS_SHIFTER=1						; 1=Car supports shifter, 0=car supports only paddles
VALID_SHIFT_RPM_WINDOW=900				;range window additional to the precise rev matching rpm that permits gear engage.
CONTROLS_WINDOW_GAIN=0.4				;multiplayer for gas,brake,clutch pedals that permits gear engage on different rev matching rpm. the lower the more difficult.
INERTIA=0.020							; gearbox inertia. default values to 0.02 if not set

[CLUTCH]
MAX_TORQUE=800					; Clutch torque 

[AUTOCLUTCH]
UPSHIFT_PROFILE=NONE					; Name of the autoclutch profile for upshifts. NONE to disable autoclutch on shift up
DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE=DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE		; Same as above for downshifts
USE_ON_CHANGES=1						; Use the autoclutch on gear shifts even when autoclutch is set to off. Needed for cars with semiautomatic gearboxes. values 1,0
MIN_RPM=1000							; Minimum rpm for autoclutch engadgement
MAX_RPM=3000							; Maximum rpm for autoclutch engadgement

[UPSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=30								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=80								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=100								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[DOWNSHIFT_PROFILE]
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach fully depress clutch
POINT_1=90								; Time to start releasing clutch
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach fully released clutch

[AUTOBLIP]
ELECTRONIC=0							; If =1 then it is a feature of the car and cannot be disabled
POINT_0=10								; Time to reach full level
POINT_1=150								; Time to start releasing gas
POINT_2=180								; Time to reach 0 gas
LEVEL=0.7								; Gas level to be reached
